con:configuration.patternText: {"data":[{"type":"master_code","attributes":{"masterCodeValues":[{"codeValueId":1,"codeId":100,"value":"CNF","displayDescription":"Click Not Found"},{"codeValueId":2,"codeId":100,"value":"RIV","displayDescription":"Revenue Invalid"},{"codeValueId":3,"codeId":100,"value":"PNF","displayDescription":"Expected Product Not Found"},{"codeValueId":4,"codeId":100,"value":"CDO","displayDescription":"Click Date Older Than 60 Days"}],"codeDescription":"Issue Codes","codeName":"issues"},"id":100},{"type":"master_code","attributes":{"masterCodeValues":[{"codeValueId":5,"codeId":101,"value":"ERR","displayDescription":"Errored"},{"codeValueId":6,"codeId":101,"value":"APR","displayDescription":"Approved"},{"codeValueId":7,"codeId":101,"value":"APP","displayDescription":"Application"},{"codeValueId":8,"codeId":101,"value":"DEC","displayDescription":"Decline"},{"codeValueId":9,"codeId":101,"value":"CAN","displayDescription":"Cancelled"}],"codeDescription":"Transaction Stages","codeName":"stages"},"id":101},{"type":"master_code","attributes":{"masterCodeValues":[{"codeValueId":10,"codeId":102,"value":"CPA","displayDescription":"CPA"},{"codeValueId":11,"codeId":102,"value":"SCPA","displayDescription":"Slotting CPA"},{"codeValueId":12,"codeId":102,"value":"COM","displayDescription":"Commission"}],"codeDescription":"Adjustment Types","codeName":"adjustments"},"id":102}]}
